Detailed Description

This class define a threadpool owning several permanent worker and can create temporary workers when it is saturated. It keeps track of the permanent worker in a waiting list. Getting one of them if a job arrives. If no permanent worker is found, the threadpool createss one temporary worker to do it if the maximum allowed wqorker has not been reached.
